post:
With our premium SSD based storage coupled with super high spec servers, we can guarantee your website running at blazing speeds! Coupled with the lightweight control panel DirectAdmin you'll be up and running in no time with one of our shared hosting solutions!

As a launch offer we are offering a 50% recurring discount for life with no price rises! Simply use the code LAUNCH50 at signup to claim!

If you have any questions please do get in touch with our sales team at sales@sharedspace.io

All hosting packages come with a 30 day moneyback guarantee! But we're sure you'll be happy with us ! We also backup all sites to secure cloud storage!

Available locations: Dallas TX

Our packages https://www.sharedspace.io/shared-hosting.html
